meanings.definition: The quality or state of being complete or total.
meanings.sent1: The utternesses of the puzzle were evident once all the pieces were put together.
meanings.sent2: The utternesses of the project were achieved after all the tasks were completed.
meanings.sent3: The utternesses of the cookie jar being empty was a sad sight for the kids.
meanings.sent4: Her smile captured the utternesses of joy and contentment.
meanings.sent5: The utternesses of the forest at dawn were breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being extreme or absolute.
meanings.sent1: The storm brought utternesses of chaos to the peaceful town.
meanings.sent2: His actions displayed utternesses of bravery in the face of danger.
meanings.sent3: The utternesses of the ice cream melting on the hot day was a sticky situation.
meanings.sent4: The utternesses of her anger were like a fierce storm brewing inside her.
meanings.sent5: The utternesses of the mountain peak took their breath away.
